import React from 'react';
import {
  List,
  Edit,
  Create,
  Datagrid,
  TextField,
  ChipField,
  BooleanField,
  ReferenceArrayField,
  SingleFieldList,
  EditButton,
  SimpleForm,
  TextInput,
  SelectInput,
  ReferenceArrayInput,
  SelectArrayInput,
  BooleanInput
} from 'react-admin';
import { TimezoneField } from '../components';

const timezones = [
  { id: -11, name: 'UTC-11' },
  { id: -10, name: 'UTC-10' },
  { id: -9, name: 'UTC-9' },
  { id: -8, name: 'UTC-8' },
  { id: -7, name: 'UTC-7' },
  { id: -6, name: 'UTC-6' },
  { id: -5, name: 'UTC-5' },
  { id: -4, name: 'UTC-4' },
  { id: -3, name: 'UTC-3' },
  { id: -2, name: 'UTC-2' },
  { id: -1, name: 'UTC-1' },
  { id: 0, name: 'UTC' },
  { id: 1, name: 'UTC+1' },
  { id: 2, name: 'UTC+2' },
  { id: 3, name: 'UTC+3' },
  { id: 4, name: 'UTC+4' },
  { id: 5, name: 'UTC+5' },
  { id: 6, name: 'UTC+6' },
  { id: 7, name: 'UTC+7' },
  { id: 8, name: 'UTC+8' },
  { id: 9, name: 'UTC+9' },
  { id: 10, name: 'UTC+10' },
  { id: 11, name: 'UTC+11' },
  { id: 12, name: 'UTC+12' },
];

export const UserList = props => (
    <List filterDefaultValues={{ type: "user" }} {...props}>
      <Datagrid>
        <TextField source="name" />
        <TextField source="email" />
        <TimezoneField source="timezone" />
        <ReferenceArrayField label="Groups" reference="groups" source="group_ids">
            <SingleFieldList>
                <ChipField source="name" />
            </SingleFieldList>
        </ReferenceArrayField>
        <BooleanField source="receiveMessage" />
        <EditButton />
      </Datagrid>
    </List>
  );
  
  export const UserCreate = props => (
    <Create {...props}>
      <SimpleForm redirect="/users">
        <TextInput source="name" />
        <TextInput source="email" />
        <TextInput source="type" value="user" disabled />
        <SelectInput source="timezone" choices={timezones} />
        <ReferenceArrayInput label="Groups" source="group_ids" reference="groups">
            <SelectArrayInput optionText="name" />
        </ReferenceArrayInput>
        <BooleanInput source="receiveMessage" />
      </SimpleForm>
    </Create>
  );
  
  export const UserEdit = props => (
    <Edit {...props}>
      <SimpleForm redirect="/users">
        <TextInput source="name" />
        <TextInput source="email" />
        <TextInput source="type" value="user" disabled />
        <SelectInput source="timezone" choices={timezones} />
        <ReferenceArrayInput label="Groups" source="group_ids" reference="groups">
            <SelectArrayInput optionText="name" />
        </ReferenceArrayInput>
        <BooleanInput source="receiveMessage" />
      </SimpleForm>
    </Edit>
  );
